{{also|阿茂整饼}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=阿茂整饼|lit=''aa mau'' makes cakes}}

===Etymology===
The first half of the Cantonese ''[[xiehouyu]]'':
: {{zh-x|阿茂整餅——冇 嗰 樣，整 嗰 樣|(The [[dim sum]] maker) ''aa mau'' makes cakes -- whichever kind (of cake) is running out will be made promptly.|C}}

Nowadays usually used disapprovingly.

|c=aa3 mau6 zing2 beng2

}}

{{zh-idiom}}

# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} to do something [[unnecessary]]; to [[ruin]] things by doing something [[superfluous]]; to do something that [[fail]]ed
